name: Kindergarten Copilot
description:
Little Tommy Tummytrouble has just become the luckiest kid in the whole world! Having submitted a macaroni picture featuring - not one, but - TWO giraffes for his school-wide art project, Tommy has won the grand prize:

A TRIP INSIDE THE COCKPIT OF A COMMERCIAL AIRLINER!

Ecstatic, Tommy takes his seat where the big grownup pilots drive the airplane. The pilot of the plane, seeing the waves of utter elation wash over Tommy's face, Captain Rodney Pissbottle decides to give him the childhood gift that he never had: the chance to control a real life airplane.

Unbeknownst to the passengers of Flight 328, Tommy would take the transport on a detour through downtown traffic. Unfortunately, the flight controls of the airliner are difficult for a five year old to follow, but with the help of the frantically barked orders from  trusty Captain Pissbottle, little Tommy Tummytrouble would become the world's very first:

HOW TO PLAY
  • Kindergarten Copilot is a simplified typing game at heart. 
  • The pilot will bark orders to you with a corresponding letter on the keyboard. 
  • Hit that letter as quickly as possible to keep as much stability to the aircraft as possible.
  • When the red bar in the top center disappears, your run is over and Tommy will gently land the aircraft on the street with everybody's safety in mind.
FEATURES
  1.  Single-letter typing
  2.  Graphics
  3.  Sound
  4.  A WORLD-WIDE LEADERBOARD so you can compete with all the other kindergarteners. 
  5.  An itch.io page
